title: Bug 114903: Default values not shown in Show Report Parameters dialog
OB: Default values are not shown in the Show Report Parameters dialog. When opening the Enter Parameters dialog, all values are empty, even though I expected to see the default values displayed.
EB: When I preview and click the Show Report Parameters button, I expect to see the default values displayed in the value box. This way, I can easily modify the parameter I want to change. It is inconvenient to have all values empty in the Enter Parameters dialog, as it requires me to input all values even if I only want to modify one parameter.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Preview the report
2. Click on the Show Report Parameters button
3. Observe that the Enter Parameters dialog opens with all values empty
